discourse_list.title: Would you participate in creating art about UNI?

content.content: Some time ago I suggested creating an NFT art ogra on UNI. Today I am very happy to see the video on twitter with the creation of UNI. I have a nephew who draws wonderfully. I hope he will develop something and expose it to the community. I think it would be a good idea for the community to participate with creations and we can vote for them. It sure enriches us … a hug to all
